member.name: T:Endeca.Web.UI.WebControls.Breadcrumbs
member.summary: Breadcrumbs server control that supports showing or hiding search, range filter, and dimension breadcrumbs. Operations supported on individual breadcrumbs include removal for all types of breadcrumbs and navigation of dimension breadcrumbs. The control also supports templates to override the rendering of each type of breadcrumb.

member.name: P:Endeca.Web.UI.WebControls.EndecaCompositeDataBoundControl.NavigationDataSourceID
member.summary: The to use for any command changes that would be done by the user. This propery should only be used in conjunction with the property. This property should not be used in conjunction the DataSourceID property.
member.remarks: The two ways of binding data into this control are: 1. The common use case. Set a NavigationDataSource's ID in the property. 2. If you want to use an alternative data source outside of the main data source. For example you may have run your own command and want to use the results from that command, but you want user interaction to affect the command in the main data source. You would use the property and the property together to set the data to render, and the DataSourceID to be modified user interactions.

member.name: E:Endeca.Web.UI.WebControls.GuidedNavigation.BuildingUrl
member.summary: Raised when a URL is being constructed for one of the hyperlinks that is rendered by this control.
member.remarks: When this control has been configured with a , be setting the property, hyperlinks are rendered instead of links that post back to the current page. Handling this event allows a page developer to override the default URLs that are generated by the . If the handler sets the property, then this control renders the value of this property, instead of the default URL.

member.name: T:Endeca.Web.UI.WebControls.TagCloud
member.summary: Tag cloud server control that displays each dimension value of a dimension as a tag in a cloud. By default, the tags will be sorted alphabetically and the size of each tag will be proportional to the record count of navigating on each dimension value.

member.name: E:Endeca.Web.UI.WebControls.TagCloud.BuildingUrl
member.summary: Raised when a URL is being constructed for one of the hyperlinks that is rendered by this control.
member.remarks: When this control has been configured with a , be setting the property, hyperlinks are rendered instead of links that post back to the current page. Handling this event allows a page developer to override the default URLs that are generated by the . If the handler sets the property, then this control renders the value of this property, instead of the default URL.

member.name: P:Endeca.Web.UI.WebControls.TagCloud.DataMember
member.summary: By default, the DataMember will be set to "DimensionStatesResult" and this result will be used to create the tag cloud based on the dimension whose ID is specified in the DimensionID property. Another possible value for DataMember is to set it to a single dimension, for example, 'DimensionStatesResult.RefinableDimensionStates["Region"]'.

member.name: P:Endeca.Web.UI.WebControls.TagCloud.DimensionValueTemplate
member.summary:
Gets or sets a template that defines how items are displayed.
Note that this template is the same as each tag in the cloud, since the cloud is made up of dimension value items.

member.name: P:Endeca.Web.UI.WebControls.TagCloud.SeparatorTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a template that defines how the separator between each element of the tag cloud is displayed.
member.remarks:
By default, the template looks like:
In other words, a single, non-breaking space
